CONTENT: How to use the Weekly Review template 👋
A weekly review is a dedicated hour set aside each week for reflection and planning. Customize this checklist to ensure that each area of your life is accounted for.

CONTENT: 🎥 Watch the [Beginner's Guide to the Weekly Review](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lrdKWwOonQs) to learn more about this essential productivity practice for clearing your mind and planning ahead.
